pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Television and Radio Scripts of Kathleen Hite
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Includes scripts for Gunsmoke (radio and television), 1957-1965, and other unidentified radio scripts. The catalog listing notes that Hite wrote for the following radio programs but it is not clear if scripts for any of the programs are included in the collection: Fort Laramie, Rogers of the Gazette, Romance, The Ghost Walks, Night Beat, The Modern Adventures of Casanova, State Fair; The Perfect Crime, Will Rogers Country Editor and the Lux Summer Theatre. Check unpublished finding aid for more information on the unidentified scripts.
